mapper.insert: /* real_insert */ INSERT INTO REAL_ESTATE ( NAME, TYPE, TEL, EMAIL, COUNTRY, CITY, PLACE_TYPE, PREFERENCE, MEMO, REGDATE, REGID, MODDATE, MODID, MEMBER_IDX ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{type}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{country}, #{city}, #{district}, #{preference}, #{memo}, NOW(), (SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE IDX = #{member_idx} LIMIT 1), NOW(), (SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE IDX = #{member_idx} LIMIT 1), #{member_idx} )
mapper.update: /* real_update */ UPDATE REAL_ESTATE SET NAME = #{name}, TYPE = #{type}, TEL = #{tel}, EMAIL = #{email}, COUNTRY = #{country}, CITY = #{city}, PLACE_TYPE = #{district}, PREFERENCE = #{preference}, MEMO = #{memo}, MODDATE = NOW(), MODID = (SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE IDX = #{member_idx} LIMIT 1) WHERE IDX = #{idx}
